import axios from 'axios' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' export default function ShopDtail() { const [item, setItem] = useState(undefined) const {id} = useParams() useEffect (()=>{ axios .get(`https://fakestoreapi.com/products/${id}`) .then((json)=>{ setItem(json.data) }) .catch((e)=>{ setItem(null) }) }, []) console.log(item) return (
{item === undefined ?
로딩중...
:item === null ?
404
: (

{item.title}

{item.description}

) }
) }
